result.title: RCC Round #2
result.content:
In the name of GOD

Second official Group contest will be held on 25 December 2014.

Contest creator is me(ATofighi) . Special Thanks to ._. for testing the contest , E.K.Goharshady for making this group and MikeMirzayanov for his nice Platform.

There are 5 Problems in this contest! (The problems are in Persian!)

Hope you enjoy the Contest.

UPD 1. زمان کانتست به پنج‌شنبه تغییر کرد، امشب شب یلداست، باید با بقیه باشه آدم.

UPD 2. The contest has 5 problems now :)

UPD 3. The 5th problem will be available both in Persian and English :D

UPD 4. Unfortunately the Persian version of the 5th problem is not ready so you may see the statements in the contest page. Sorry for that.

UPD 5 RCC Round #2! (Not 1.5)

UPD 6 ۱۰ دقیقه به تاخیر افتاد کانتست.

سوالات به صورت PDF در همینجا قرار خواهد گرفت.

UPD 7 Download PDF File: http://bayanbox.ir/download/7464278031278439689/rcc-round-2.pdf

UPD 8 نفرات برتر:

  1. MMJ
  2. erfanmip
  3. aren

UPD 9 دوروز دیگه راه‌حل سوالات قرار خواهد گرفت.

UPD 10 Rahe Hal: http://bayanbox.ir/download/3032007973221937001/rcc-round-2-rahe-hal.pdf
